name: Zero Dawn - Chapter 1
description:
The world is on the brink of war. Teams of highly skilled operatives have been dispatched on each side to end it. At all costs. As the Zero Dawn team discover more and more about this war, they begin to discover who they are really fighting for.

Developed in Cryengine 3 - Zero Dawn uses the latest* technology to immerse the user in a world of secrecy, war and espionage. Use the environment around you to complete objectives stealthily or gun-ho.

Please note, that there will be a few glitches in the game, and with the way i am uploading this there will probably be no updates to it on here :( sorry for any inconvenience caused, although if there is a major update though, i will contact everyone who has bought the game with a link to the new version.

SPECS:

    MINIMUM:
    • OS: Windows Vista SP1, Windows 7 or Windows 8.1 (64bit)
    • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
    • Memory: 4 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers
    RECOMMENDED:
    • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 (64-bit)
    • Processor: Intel Quad-Core (i5 2300) or AMD Octo-Core (FX 8150)
    • Memory: 8 GB RAM
    • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 660Ti or greater, AMD Radeon HD 7950 or greater
    • DirectX: Version 11
    • Storage: 8 GB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card with latest drivers

*As of 2015/16

!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!READ THIS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The item you are downloading is a basic launcher for Zero Dawn. It allows you to visit the webpage to download the game and also specify a location for where you downloaded the game to. Please note that the game itself is in a ZIP folder which will need to be extracted. If you have any struggles or concerns please contact us.

The reason behind this is because our game is too large for itch.io to upload to its own servers :(
